Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2015...
Injured on 8/16/2017 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 1st round, by Los Angeles (A) in 2018...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to New York (A) on 3/2/2018 (Going to NYY: P Manny Valero. Going to LAA: SS Cristobal Vega)...
Earned first career win on 5/12/2018...
Injured on 6/22/2018 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/7/2020, off Justin Wilson (WAS)...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/31/2020 (Going to NYY: P Carlos Baca. Going to CHC: P Manny Valero)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Chicago (N) to San Francisco on 3/2/2022 (Going to CHC: P Bobby Clewis. Going to SF: P Manny Valero)...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2023, going 1-0, 0.78...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2024, off Trevor May (COL)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/5/2025 to a 5-year deal worth $8,640,000 per year...
Traded from Philadelphia to Arizona on 6/14/2028 (Going to ARI: P Manny Valero, 2B Fernando Greco. Going to PHI: P Harvey Bailey)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/14/2030 to a 3-year deal worth $5,770,000 per year...
Released by Boston on 7/17/2030...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/24/2030 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
